contentScriptNotLoaded.message: Please, reload the current page to be able to use this extension.
contentScriptNotLoaded.description: An error message that is shown when the content script is not loaded in the page.

downloadTableData.description: A button label to download the table data.

startPicking.description: A button label to start picking the page elements.

continuePicking.description: A button to continue picking the elements.

selectPagination.description: A button label to select the pagination element.

reSelectPagination.description: A button label to re-select the pagination element.

startScraping.description: A button label to start scraping the data.

downloadScrapedData.description: A button label to download the scraped data.

resetSettings.description: A button label to reset the settings.

stopScraping.description: A button label to stop scraping the data.

madeBy.description: A message to show the extension is made with love.

identifier.description: A label for the identifier input.

type.description: A label for the type input.

paginationSelectionError.message: Please select a valid pagination element.
paginationSelectionError.description: An error message to show when invalid pagination element is selected.

paginationSelectionSuccess.description: A success message to show when pagination element is selected successfully.

targetSettings.description: A label for the target settings section.

identifierMustBeUnique.message: Identifier must be unique and not empty.
identifierMustBeUnique.description: An error message to show when identifier is not unique.

scrapingDone.message: Scraping Done, Please click on the download button to download the scraped data.
scrapingDone.description: A success message to show when scraping is done.
